headline.main: Credit Government Scientists With Developing Anti-AIDS Drug

docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: George Bush got his first big role as a drug warrior back in 1982 when he was Vice President and Ronald Reagan put him in charge of a task force to stop drugs entering Florida. Later that year, Mr. Reagan called for more task forces - ''a major initiative that I believe can mark a turning point in the battle against crime.

headline.main: Some War; Meanwhile, Crack Undermines America

docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: Nearly three-quarters of the way through the first year of the new Administration, extraordinarily little of major significance has been produced in Washington. As a Governor, a citizen and a Democrat, I think we have given an appropriate period of deference to the new Administration. It is time now for a different approach.

headline.main: Time for Bush to Back Up His Speeches With Action

byline.original: By Mario M. Cuomo; Mario M. Cuomo, Governor of New York, is completing his second term

headline.main: Don't Liken Smoking to Drug Addiction; Stop Cigarette Ads

docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: A Food and Drug Administration advisory committee today suggested stronger labeling for the sleep drug Halcion to explain more clearly what side effects some patients might expect. The panel also concluded that reports of adverse effects had been overstated.

headline.main: F.D.A. Asks Stronger Label On Sleep Pill Under Scrutiny
